page.title: 20Editor's notes Bridlington
page.content: The Information on this disc was written by various individuals. I have shortened some of the material so that it fits onto one page. Two of the contributions are presented over two pages as it was not possible to shorten them without losing a substantial amount of information. I used my own computer to enter the data and of course did so in my own time. It would have been better if the author's could have entered their own pieces but we found both time and equipment to be in short supply. Our school requires at least one year's notice if it is to use such a large project in the curriculum. Those of us that have been involved have found the project fascinating and look forward to the publication of the video discs. K.R.Prosser-Snelling 3/09/85
